text:
e="preserve">Linda F. Collins-Smith (December 31, 1961 – June 4, 2019) was an American businesswoman and politician. She was a Republican member of the Arkansas Senate from 2015 through 2019 and before was a member of the Arkansas House of Representatives from 2011 to 2013. She was born in Pocahontas, Arkansas.
On June 4, 2019, a decomposing body was found in a blanket outside Collins-Smith's home in Pocahontas, with a gunshot wound. On June 6, police announced the body was Collins-Smith. They did not confirm a cause of death.
